content: उद्भट {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Excellent, pre-eminent; पदे पदे संति भटा रणोद्भटाः <ls>N. 1. 132.</ls> {@--2@} Exalted, magnanimous. --टः {@--1@} A fan for winnowing corn. {@--2@} A tortoise.
उद्भट One of the earliest writers on Alaṃkāra. He was the chief Paṇḍita or Sabhāpati of king Jayāpīda of Kāshmir (779-813 <ab>A. D.</ab>).
